website_summaries.verdict: Air vent attachment keeps it off the dash. Good hold for those who can't have a phone mount on their dashboard.
pros: Strong magnetic hold that keeps phone in place
Vent attachment works well in most vent designs
cons: If the phone has a curved back, the magnets may have problems sticking

customer_reviews.title: They work well.
customer_reviews.text: Had similar product but lost magnetic plate when removed protective cover an forgot it was there. Found these Magnetic Mount, WizGear [2 PACK] Universal Air Vent Magnetic Car Mount Phone Holder on Amazon with a attractive price. Arrived in time. Like the idea on having a choice of using a small found metal plate of a larger rectangular one. I preferred the larger rectangular plate tho. The magnetic mounts fit my air vents in my car an truck well. Good product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use it in all of my cars!!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: magnets are extremely strong and hold your phone well to the clip, great product and works exactly as expected Cons: NONE! Notes: depending on the car you really need to make sure the location of your vents are in a good spot for these, also that they will fit the vent well enough to hold the phone. Like my 2016 kia optima it fits perfectly and is in a good location to view the phone when driving, but with my 2004 subaru forester xt the vent is much lower, so it makes it harder to look at the phone and pay attention to where you are going if you have your GPS on.
customer_reviews.author: michael thomas

customer_reviews.title: I got this for my entire family!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It’s so simple - stays on the dash nicely. The metal plate on your phone is thin. The fact that the magnet isn’t on the phone itself I feel is better for the phone. If you have a phone cover - you don’t even have to stick it to the phone. Rather just insert it between your phone and cover. The magnet is very strong and should hold.
customer_reviews.author: Mika

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT buy!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this mount for about 2 months. I loved it until I realized it was actually DAMAGING my car vent. Take a look at the photos to see. There are metal prongs that have busted through the rubber and have scratched the vent. I've sent Wizgear a message regarding the damage. Will update after I've heard from them.
customer_reviews.author: Dani1031

customer_reviews.title: Fails to grip competently
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased to replace similar device left behind in a rental car Magnet is OK, but rubber fingers do not adequately grip the vent fins. Phone + mount fall out every 10 minutes or so, which make it less than useful for intended purpose. This unit has different sized slots, but neither work in my Prius vent. Suggest you consider the Aukey equivalent, which worked well in same position in my car (and in the rental)..
customer_reviews.author: Diana Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great price, magnetic sticker works well through my normal ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price, magnetic sticker works well through my normal thickness case on an iPhone 6. However, I couldn't use it with my 2017 Honda Odyssey because of the angle of the air vents. Also, the clip of the phone holder scratched the air vents. (Photo is not rotated properly, sorry)
customer_reviews.author: Bossytoe

customer_reviews.title: Might work *if*  you have ideal place to mount
customer_reviews.text: My phone has yet to make it much further than a block without falling off. Flat dashes/vents would probably make it more useful. If your interior is rounded and curvy, you may also have trouble finding a place that will secure your phone. I'm not the most careful, and even when I break something, I can usually figure it out eventually. I am giving up on these after breaking to vent Louvre and one of the mounts.
customer_reviews.author: moabjuice

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt stay in the vent
customer_reviews.text: The magnet is powerful. But doesn't fit 2 of my very different cars with 2 very different vents. I pull the phone to use it from the vent...and the magnet comes with it. I take a hard turn.....the phone falls out with the magnet along with it. Prongs aren't long enough for the vents. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ciana

customer_reviews.title: Best $9 I've ever spent
customer_reviews.text: Update - the metal inside of the rubber has forced it's way through. Three of my vents are now scratched up with visible gashes. I did not notice because they were tilted up but when pulled down gauges are clearly visible. Buyer beware These things are awesome. You can put both on adjoining vents to use for ipad, kindle fire, etc. too. Best purchase I've made in a while.
customer_reviews.author: druznak

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The magents will not hold a standard smart phone. As soon as the vehicle moves the phone hits the floor. I tried using both magnets that helped some, but does not allow me to have one in each vehicle, as I planned. Once you give up and figure you wasted your money you are left with a sticky residue on your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Scripture

customer_reviews.title: Not for every vehicle.
customer_reviews.text: Magnet works fine. Holds phone well. However, the Mount itself does not stay put in the air vent. Maybe it just doesn't work for Subaru's. I've tried several different ways to get it to stay, but it keeps falling out. It's like the rubber holding it into the vent is just too soft. May work for other vehicles, just not mine.
customer_reviews.author: Mango

customer_reviews.title: Check to see if your vents work....carefully!
customer_reviews.text: So, I was thrilled with these because my best friend had them in her car and I loved them! I put the vent magnet on and it was too wide, the magnet would come off with the phone every time. I swapped the direction of the clamp and pushed it onto my vent. Then the entire vent got pushed into my car. I cannot get it out. When I took the magnet off the vent, it pulled the vent pieces off with it. It's a great idea, but it just didn't work for my car. Super pissed.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Pluhacek

customer_reviews.title: JUST PUSH TO INSTALL
customer_reviews.text: Tired of trying to retrieve my cell from my purse or finding a big enough place in our Dodge Grand Caravan I decided to try this product. No problem installing on one of the 3 air vents. When I'm not driving I attached it to my central air vent. If I used the driver's my husband complained he couldn't adjust the vent to his liking. This is a problem but compromises are needed. Would be nice if it stood a little prouder as it's hard to adjust other dials underneath. The magnet seems strong enough and even held while driving on a sort of road into a primitive camp site. Still evaluating.
customer_reviews.author: ARLMAR

customer_reviews.title: The Product is simple and I have been using this for long time now and it works great. I recommend this product as it gives you ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handy product and it has saved me lots of hassles managing the phone while driving my car. The Product is simple and I have been using this for long time now and it works great. I recommend this product as it gives you lots of ease in placing calls or receiving calls or checking incoming calls -- picking your phone from the attachment and placing it back is really cool. Place the metal pads provided on the back of the phone cover if the cover is thick. if the protective cover of your phone is very slim you could apply it on the inside of the slim fit cases. It works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Saani

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect this to work as well as it does, especially for the price. The magnet is so strong and stable. I've been using this for over a year and I have never had an issue with it falling off of the air vent while driving. This product is so affordable and they give you two, so I ended up giving one to my father who also loves it. I see a lot of questions and concerns about the magnet screwing with the phone but it does not. I don't know the science or reason as to why not, but I can tell you from personal experience that my phone is still in perfect working condition.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.

customer_reviews.title: Nifty & Fast Phone Mount, Easy Install
customer_reviews.text: These are so handy! The pack of 2 mounts comes with 4 metal plates that have adhesive on the back. Personally, I would not recommend removing the backing and sticking the metal directly to your phone or case because you’ll never be able to get it off. Ever. The product comes with small sheets of paper which can be placed between the metal sheet and your phone to keep it from being scratched. This is what I did, and then just put my phone case back on over it. I haven’t had any problems with metal sliding around, and the magnet on the mount is very strong, so my phone has stayed in place well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen B.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and VERY handy
customer_reviews.text: This product is a very handy addition to my mobile phone and car. The magnet is definitely strong enough to hold my phone safely. The car mount portion is also sturdy and fits snugly in the car vents. Installation was a breeze. I have built in Sat Nav. However, there are times when using the navigation feature on the phone is easier or more accurate. This little gadget makes it easier and safer to do just that. I was able to find a spot on the phone case that the magnet did not interfere with my wireless charging stand. All around successful purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John F

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this, I was glad to find it came with two holders! I thought I was just getting one for my car, but now my husband has one for his pickup also. The holder mounts easily on the air vents, and my phone attaches to it. It is in the perfect spot for a quick glance for the gps, or to see who is calling. My hands free device still works well with my phone, even though I was not sure about it since you place a thin magnet between the phone and the case, but it works great. I would definitely recommend this product. It is so easy to use and put in place.
customer_reviews.author: becbec

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars. Love this thing.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I think I've bought about 6 so far because every time someone gets in my car, they see it and want one. Lol. The magnet works well through my basic case on my galaxy. Easy to assemble and works well to hold phone while driving. So far everyone has loved this and how easy it is to use. My husband has a thick 2-part case for his phone, so the magnet won't connect well for him, but he's the only one with this issue. I would (and do) recommend if you're looking for an inexpensive and easy to use holder that works with any phone.
customer_reviews.author: My2CentsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Quality over Quantity - Find something else
customer_reviews.text: So I was out of town and my friend had something similar to this. I searched Amazon as I always do and found this similar AND CHEAPER. I got several and gave them as gifts. Well let's just say cheaper isn't always better. The BIGGEST PROBLEM IS THEY DO NOT HOLD ON THE AIR VENTURES. Any medium to hard turn or stop the whole thing comes flying out of the vent. I have given four of these as gifts I have received 2 back heck I don't even use mine anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Truttier

customer_reviews.title: Like a Rock
customer_reviews.text: I've used many many other phone adapters and they all require some spring-loaded mechanism that you have to use 2 hands to attach your phone. This is exactly what I was looking for! With one hand I can stick my phone to it, and the magnet is so strong that my phone stays put. I can even plug in my cord with one hand and the phone doesn't slide across the magnet! In fact, when I try to remove my phone, it usually removes the whole adapter from the car, which is really the only flaw. If only I could figure out a way to stop that. But, otherwise, it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Sound Asleep

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them...  You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: I have these in every car I own. I love being able to hop in the car and toss my phone against one of these magnetic holders. It's just so simple. The magnets are strong and hold the phone even over bumps and railroad tracks. The fins grab onto the vents tightly as well. Even after years of use they're still in place. The only reason I'm buying another set of these is I rented a truck for a move, and I left my set from my car in the rental. I didn't shop around, I just ordered a new set of what I know works well for me. I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Knisely

customer_reviews.title: Makes hands free easy!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a note 8 and the magnet is very strong. I have phone against vent and have never had it fall to the floor once while driving. The only issue I can find with this is when the cold weather starts to move in and I place my heater on and through my vents it will cause my phone to run hot and shut down, Other than the heat from the vent this is a great product and the seller is is a great company to buy from.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Clift

customer_reviews.title: Elegant solution depending on your vents.
customer_reviews.text: This didn't work on my vehicles, but works perfectly on my daughter's. If the vent louvers move easily in the ordinary course, the mount and the phone will always "sink" the louvers downward and everything falls or sags. Also, if the vents are circular and have a knob in the center, you may not have enough space to push the mount so that it's secure. That said, if you have the right kind of vents for these to work, the price is right and the magnets worked well through an OtterBox.
customer_reviews.author: BarnBeez

customer_reviews.title: Feeling guilty that I didn't give 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about this product. The magnets work well and it was a good value but I have a Note 10+ and I would have had to put the metal at the top of my phone in order to be able to still use a portion of the AC vent. I live in Arizona. I need every square inch of cold air flow. I purchased another holder with an arm so that the phone doesn't block the vent. I didn't attempt to return the item as there was nothing wrong with it, I just preferred a different option.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: this is pure garbage do not buy
customer_reviews.text: this is pure garbage do not buy. the way the vents are positioned it can make ur phone hot or cold....POORLY DESIGNED and GARBAGE.. THINK BEFORE U BUY THIS PIECE OF GARBAGE
customer_reviews.author: VMathews

customer_reviews.title: ... surprised by the quality of this product given the great price, and for two
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this product given the great price, and for two! My husband has the iPhone 7 and this holds it great. I have the 6s Plus, and while for the most part it does hold it, there have been times the hold is not 100%. In fairness I can usually tell when it isn't going to stay and after readjusting it works great. It may also be the design of my case and the way the magnet is held off to the side (I have a Loopy, and the magnet won't sit right in the middle due to the loop). Overall, great product, great price, worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kalli Yoder

customer_reviews.title: How did I ever drive without these?!?
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much that I have been verbally recommending it to everyone I know and will be purchasing this item for several of my family members this upcoming Christmas!! This easily clips into the vent of my car and the magnet is strong enough to hold my iPhone 5c with a life proof case on it (my phone is a brick and weighs probably 3 pounds lol) If you're on the fence about this, my piece of advice to you would be simply BUY IT! I promise you will not regret this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: Holy Soccer Goalie!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is strong. I put the adhesive magnet in my baby's diaper when she wasn't looking and stuck her to the air vent in my car. Who am I kidding, of course she was looking. But what's she gonna do? She's a baby! Anyway, it totally supported her weight! Your phone will NEVER fall off (unless the magnet isn't centered). This is single-handedly the best car air vent phone mount. Worth every friggin penny. You better believe it. I'm buying more cars just so I can put these on all the vents. Then I'm going to buy more phones so I can stick a phone on every vent in all of my new cars. I'm so excited!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Papagiorgio

customer_reviews.title: Great mount...needs more color
customer_reviews.text: This makes the 4th set I have purchased. They are very strong and hold the phone extremely well. I purchased these for my husband as he drives a truck. My only complaint is that he keeps leaving them in the different trucks that he drives causing me to have to have to order more. The reason he keeps forgetting them is that they are black and blend in so well with the vents that they are hard to see. It would be nice if they came in a different color or had something on them that made them more noticeable. Other than that I would definitely recommend them to anyone looking for a magnet mount.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Limburg

customer_reviews.title: See your cell at a glance
customer_reviews.text: This was such a fabulous idea. I didn't want anything permanent in my car and this was perfect. The little piece that goes on to the vent is unobtrusive but large enough to hold my phone, even over terrible potholes. The magnet is inside of my phone case so I did not have to stick anything permanently on my phone either. I love it. Very convenient. Worth the moola
customer_reviews.author: B Snov

customer_reviews.title: Basic
customer_reviews.text: Magnet is too strong for its own good. Comes right off the vent, sticking too the phone/magnet wayyy more often than I'm comfortable with. Actually broken my vent. When trying to push back onto the vent I actually detached the vent from the car by pushing it in. There's no way to reattach the vent so it just sits there now. I have to wedge two fingers between the vent to hold it while pushing the piece onto it. It's such a pain. All that being said/ it doesn't drop my phone... If you really want something useful, I'd probably invest in a different type of mount. I wouldn't recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Crane

customer_reviews.title: Everything you'd expect.
customer_reviews.text: These work phenomenal. The magnets are incredibly strong for the size. I live in Michigan and we have some of the worst roads in the country, they're absolutely awful and my phone has never once fallen off. My vents are on a bit of angle(ford fusion), so it doesn't allow the phone mount nice and flush as I would like, and it still always holds on. If you're concerned with it falling off, don't worry at all. One thing to note, it will block one of your AC vents, so sometimes I don't like to use it when it's very hot and I need the cooling.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Strong Magnet and Connects Easily
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this magnet mount for about 2 weeks. I have it inside of my case which is a thin cheap silicon one. It attaches the mount simply and releases easily but is not loose that it would fall off. It does the job pretty well. The connection to the vent is also strong. I had to rotate the back clip for thinner vents and now it is a strong connection. I was worried when I went to detach the phone if it would pull out but its not even loose. YMMV based on your vents, but my Outback worked great. Good product, good price, better than the old suction cup one I had.
customer_reviews.author: aivanov

customer_reviews.title: Did not work with my combination of phone and car
customer_reviews.text: Product seems like it would work with a lot of cars and phones but did not work with mine. I have a otter box case and tried the magnet both in the case and out of it. When I would hit some bumps the phone would go flying. Also due to the angle of vents on silverados , i think it did not work great. Probably would be great for a lot of other cars and cases though.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I read good and bad reviews. I have no issues and I like that there are different sizes to put on to the vent. It is very convenient for me and I don't lose my phone anymore or leave it in the car. It holds tight, sometimes when I take the phone off the mount comes with it the magnet is powerful. But it never comes off while driving and I've adjusted to remove it by sliding it off the mount vs just pulling.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy B

customer_reviews.title: BIGGER distraction than help, huge design and usability flaws
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe this product has such a positive review by so many. Are they real? Couple of SERIOUS FLAWS I found with this product: 1. When mounted on the dashboard/vent, the phone is way FAR for reach and it is a bigger distraction to use the phone when using this mount than help. 2. When your cars vent is tilted, the phone is also TILTED so much and it is so hard to see anything and use. I find this product a bigger distraction than help.3. magnet is not strong enough to hold note3 or one plus 2 phones. they keep falling.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Paul

customer_reviews.title: Gets job done but occasionally not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: For the most part I like this product, it’s nice to be able to pull my phone on and off and I don’t have to haggle with an extender or anything. Tough part for me is that my phone is in a wallet so I have to fold it back to allow the magnet to catch the metal plate in my drivers license slot. Often when I pull my phone off I also pull off the magnet from the vents so I have to put it back on. And on occasion my phone becomes to heavy and it drops to the floor. But for the price, I think it gets the job done 8/10 times.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Northcutt

customer_reviews.title: didnt use it after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: was good while it lasted. the grip no longer hold onto the vent that well, so whenever I went over bumps for long rides the thing would slowly slip out. it's also blocking a big chunk of the AC from the vent when the phone is place on it. If u switch phones a lot and don't have the magnetic stick on the back of the phone then there is no way to continue using this phone holder. I opted to buy a different phone holder. never bother to leave reviews until as there is nothing else to do in the house during this pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: It's me

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: ***disclaimer, I did return these*** I bought these and they were pretty cool. They had very good connection with the metal playe that attaches to the phone. I had the plate mounted under the rubber part if my otterbox with my S8+. I was fairly impressed with how sturdy they held the phone. I cannot attest to how they do while driving. I ultimately had to return them because the vents in my newer model civic have revessed vents and the clamps were too short to insert in the vents and reach the phone. So from my experience, I give them 5 stars, as long as they will fit.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: A superior design compared to "bracketed" mounts!
customer_reviews.text: Price paid for one would be a good deal, but to get two for the price is great! Works well with my 5se, and metal piece is thin on the inside of the phone sleeve. Firm grip using on RX300 with vertical vents. Other products have not been as adaptable. Also using on horizontal vents on A4 and CLK320. All working perfectly. Will recommend to friends. Glad I took a chance. Was concerned magnet wouldn't be strong enough. But iPhone 5 is lightweight compared to some of newer smartphones. But it would probably work well with bigger phones. It stays put once attached to the air vent louvre in my cars. Have bought extras, and given to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wong

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: My own fault for not thinking it through. I bought the phone attachment and love that but needed something in the car to hold it for when I use GPS on my phone. If you have the heat on, it heats up your phone. If you have the air on, it turns the phone ice cold. I’m thinking it’s not a great thing for the phone itself so I don’t use them now. It doesn’t hold the phone too strongly either. I’ve had it pop off while hitting a bump and the phone landed at my feet. Luckily not under my brake pedal. Not safe. Look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: C.P.

customer_reviews.title: Works as described.....
customer_reviews.text: Works like it says......I can see why some folks are saying it 'doesn't fit' but if you take your time and use the correct slot to fit your vent 'slats' then all is well. As to durability...too early to tell but the magnet is plenty strong to hold my iPhone ---the metal plate inside the case on my wife's and outside the case on mine...can't really tell any difference. Would be nice if the magnet piece was a bit 'longer' to compensate for car vents where the angles are awkward...allowing you to adjust the viewing angle of your phone when attached. That said, its simple design and strong magnet work just fine. Price is good for two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and works pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can just insert the magnet into my case without it having to be stuck on it, if I choose. Sometimes if you don’t stick those pieces on in the right spot, the phone just isn’t supported well, but this vent device does come with the option of sticking or not! Love that! It does come out of the vent sometimes, not often, when i pull my phone off the vent or when I’m trying to adjust my phone better, but it still works good to keep my phone up on the dash and is easy to pop back in when that happens. I like that it’s super easy to install. Works good for me.
customer_reviews.author: PaulaPockett

customer_reviews.title: Mounts '08 Ford 150 XLT Dash
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY!!! A STRONG secure method to mount my huge iPhone Plus and Otterbox to the dash of my '08 ford 150. *No clip or unclip, no lock or unlock the carriage until you can't even grab the thing. *Two dash base magnets, two round 1 3/4" diameter metal plates, two 2 1/2" by 1 3/4" rectangle adhesive plates for your phone or phone case. Can likely hold a small tablet to act as a navigation mapper if you satellite capability. *Magnets are beautifully strong. *Cheap price, good quality, simple design...what's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: The SakDaddyTop Contributor: Drums

customer_reviews.title: Works great in both my Hyundais
customer_reviews.text: I have a Hyundai Kona and Genesis and bought one for each car and have been using it for almost a year. I centered the magnet inside my phone case on the back of the phone to avoid having to adhere it to my phone (which I didn't want to do). It works great and the magnet strength is plenty strong when I slap my phone on the receptacle in the car, which hooks easily into one of the air vents. I can easily see the map on my phone if needed. It's a really simple and well designed device.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Adhesion to phone magnet is strong; takes small space in the car Cons: adhesion to phone is too strong that when you take your phone it may stick with it. (been using it for around a year; this scenario exists but does not always happen; after all, the connection between it with air vent is less strong than its adhesion to the phone) Recommended in general
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Very strong magnet. Lets me keep the metal plate inside my phone case.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very strong magnetic phone mount. I am finally able to keep the metal plate inside my phone case instead of having it protrude on the outside. The magnet is strong enough to hold the plate through my case. Other magnetic mounts have been too weak to keep a good hold unless the plate was directly touching the mount. This mount comes with a variety of plates to fit your needs. The vent clip is also very sturdy and has a strong grip. The mount doesn't move at all when I attach or detach my phone. Overall, a good, solid phone mount.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not even worth considering.
customer_reviews.text: Item didn’t even work once. I have an iPhone 7 in a decent case and even though the magnets seem to support the weight of the phone in my hand, the phone simply slides off of the mount in the vehicle. Hands down the worst product I’ve ever purchased from Amazon in the many years I have been a prime member. Not even worth returning to try getting a refund. Complete garbage and that’s where it lies, in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Lopez

customer_reviews.title: The concept is great; product not so much
customer_reviews.text: The concept is great; product not so much. Over just a week of use, the rubber (or whatever material the foot-like part is made of) peels and the metal shows up and scratches the car vent's plastic. Does not hold any more with the rubber material coming off. I purchased 3 orders of these over time, hoping to have them work... but all of them are failing me. I moved on to finding one with adjustable clamps which seem way better.
customer_reviews.author: Hulk12Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy Grip
customer_reviews.text: We used to always have the magnetic mount that stick to the dashboard, but our new car just didn’t have any good places for the dashboard mount. I tentatively bought this one, thinking it would probably fall off our AC vent, or break the vent plastic. I’m happy to say that this magnetic grip was the perfect solution. There are two grip tightness sizes, our car needed the smaller/tighter grip, and it never wobbles or falls out of place. The magnet is very strong. Not much else to say about this product. I’m very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Got as a gift and not really happy
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift for my Dad. He liked it but didn't like the annoying branding. I figured a sharpie would do the trick but the company purposefully used a rubber that cannot be drawn on or over. He hasn't used it since, and I kinda feel like a trash son for not getting him something higher quality. Damn it's late, and I'm having them late night thoughts. DUUUUUDE, remember that one time in 3rd grade when... shut up brain, let me go to sleep, why am I reviewing something I bought like 3 years ago off Amazon. I need to go to sleep, ooooh hot girl popped into my brain. Gotta go :D
customer_reviews.author: Failumni on YouTube :)

customer_reviews.title: It’s taken me ages to find a car mount that works this well
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried tons of car mount styles, none of which works in my car. This has some issues, but so far it’s the best of the lot. Pros: easy to install Fits my car Attractive Cons: I had to get a new case to allow the magnets to fit properly You can’t adjust the angle much and part of the display is blocked by the steering wheel in my car The magnets aren’t quite strong enough for bumpy terrain and every time I drive over potholes the phone falls to the floor of the car and is difficult to retrieve while driving
customer_reviews.author: Adina M.

customer_reviews.title: some cases don't work and wireless charging is nada
customer_reviews.text: I love this is works great but if you have a wireless charge it will interfere and won't work. I have a wallet case and I had to put the metal plate close to the outside of the case. It holds up well but probably not as string as if it were a thinner case. For my boyfriends phone he has a very tactical looking case and there wasn't many smooth places to out the plate. They do send two sizes of metal plates and that was helpful but since he had to move the plate lower to use it wireless charger the stability on the magnet in the car is not as great as it could be.
customer_reviews.author: Anna S.

customer_reviews.title: Scratched up my car's vents
customer_reviews.text: These lasted a good 6 months before the rubber broke through. The metal parts under the rubber then brushed up against the plastic vents of the car and scratched them up bad. I would not recommend this product due to this reason.
customer_reviews.author: FoodCritic

customer_reviews.title: Great For A Person On The Go!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was efficiently packaged with two of the magnetic mounts. Also included were a couple of each size of the magnets that are placed on the back of your phone. For a Iphone 11 pro max or any of your larger smartphone I would advise to at least put three of the stick-able magnets on the phone. I noticed when I only used two that the phone would fall if any sudden movement or stop occurred. After placing the 3rd magnet on the back of the phone everything worked seamlessly with the phone staying in place. Quality and worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Denzell Holland

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price and easy install!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this more for my husband because he's always using the phone navigation apps instead of the navigation system on his truck(because of the live traffic updates), but there's not a good spot for the phone without having to look down when he's driving. He installed one in my car first, and I found out that I love having my phone mounted up high while I drive. And it helps me resist the urge to browse on my phone while sitting in traffic! The install was super easy and the magnet if very strong. I like that I don't have to attach anything with adhesive to my car or phone and it still works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Most reliable car phone mount yet!
customer_reviews.text: This is, hands down, the most secure mount I have found (and I've bought several) for my phone while driving. It holds the phone securely and I have no worries it will fall. The biggest downside to it is that the LG v40 and LG v50 absolutely will not wirelessly charge due to the magnet. That's a big disappointment. Because I work from home and don't commute every day, I have a phone case in the car with the magnet and then my daily case in order to wirelessly charge my phone.
customer_reviews.author: stglide13

customer_reviews.title: Works okay.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my high school new driver. To hold the phone during GPS use. It is okay. The magnetic holding power is fine. If you line it up right, it stays in place. It stays in the vent well too. One issue of it xoming out and it was dirst uae so may have been I dis not push it in correctly. The problem is the screen faces down toward the floor. If you llay with it mabe you can adjust it better. As I said it ia okay and it was pretty cheap for 2.
customer_reviews.author: mike mccarthy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many car mounts over the years to wind up throwing them away or giving them away but this one is by far THE BEST car mount I have purchased! I have been using this for several years now and have purchased for my family and friends. The only issue is your phone will get hot and:or cold because it sits in the vent so any hot/cold air is directly hitting your phone. I turn off the vent to where my car mount sits and it does just fine
customer_reviews.author: N. Stickles

customer_reviews.title: Strong Magnet
customer_reviews.text: These are strong magnets. Included in the packaging are magnet "stickers" that you can place on your phone or GPS, etc. to work with the mount. The mounts fit into any vent and my phone stuck to the mount easily. The only caveat I have is that my new phone/case/ring is heavy and the phone tilts a little towards the dash. I haven't used it much, but feel that if I have to do some pushing of buttons (not while driving, of course) the phone might fall down.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Gutknecht

customer_reviews.title: Is "OK" Not great
customer_reviews.text: This product has a Strong magnet. PROBLEM IS... The part that is suppose to slide on to your car's air conditioning vent doesn't grip well and every time one needs their phone and goes to pull it off the magnet, the whole thing comes out of the vent then you have to pull them apart and remount the unit BACK into the vent.Too much work for me. I think they need to make the grip somehow better for the vent louvers or reduce the magnets power. I returned mine unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for 95% of the time driving, but phone doesn't stick well on turns
customer_reviews.text: Fits both of my cars (one European and one Japanese) perfectly and love that this is non-damaging to the car. The magnets are strong and my wife doesn't have much of an issue with her small iphone and thinner case, but my larger phone (Pixel 4 XL) and thicker case (Spigen) doesn't hold as well. When I go through turns at any speed over 35 mph (think freeway onramp) then the phone will just slip off and fall at my feet. I like this, just wish the magnet was stronger
customer_reviews.author: Darth Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Loving this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really great product. It keeps my phone perfectly mounted. I had to super glue the magnet strip to the back of my phone case b/c the car mount is so powerful it pulled the magnet strip off my phone repeatedly until it lost its stickiness all together. I tried to put it under my case, but then the magnet strip wasn't strong enough to hold to the mount. The super glue has made this product perfect. Not sure if you'd want to go that far, but if you do you wont regret it. Just make sure you're 100% sure you want the magnet strip where you glue it. No going back.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Cassels

customer_reviews.title: Will not hold an iphone 11 pro max
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a reasonable device for smaller phones. Unfortunately, it will not hold the weight of an iPhone 11 pro max. The seller suggested that I could double up the vent holder, in tandem configuration on the vent, but my small vents will not hold 2 of the magnets. Also, I bought it to get two holders, not one. Obviously, I could have returned the item, but during the holidays the packaging was discarded. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Craig M. Kimmel

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet but flimsy vent hold.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in order to have a safe place for my Note 9 because my phone usually flies around the car when I drive. The magnet is very strong so it does an awesome job keeping the phone in place. However, the design that keeps it secured on the vent is pretty flimsy and whenever I try to grab the phone, the entire thing comes off. In order for this to work, you cannot pull the phone straight off, you actually have to slide it off in order to prevent the unit from dislodging from the vent. Other than this design defect, it works pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Carucci

customer_reviews.title: But my main problem is that the whole magnet easily pulls out of the air vent every time I ...
customer_reviews.text: The idea of being able to remove the mount from the vents to use in different cars seemed appealing. But my main problem is that the whole magnet easily pulls out of the air vent every time I try to pull my phone off. I also have to really wedge this in the air vents to get it to hold the phone securely, which feels like too much pressure to put on the plastic of the air vents.
customer_reviews.author: mommabear

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: These are quality magnets. They hold phones of various weights and sizes. Among my husband and I, we have 4 different phones (work and personal each). This is very easy to use interchangeable with the phones. For my work phone, I don't want to stick the magnet on the back of the case, so I put it in between the phone and case and this magnet is strong enough to still work. They have two sizes on the plug that you attach to the vent so they can attach snug. Good price, good product. would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic Phone Car Mount - WORKED just FINE for a year or so.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this mount for over a year now and it slowly starts failing on me. Whenever I need to get a mounted phone from car it comes with the magnetic mount itself. Unfortunately the rubber grip looses its durability and does not connect the base of the mount to a car air vent as good as before. Gotta replace it with the same or similar product. Wish it lasted longer, but WizGear has to make money from you to!
customer_reviews.author: Rasl

customer_reviews.title: Phone Holder Much Better When Mounted To Vent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased another magnetic phone mount which used adhesive and stuck to my actual dash board. I was happy with it for the first 3 months and then all of a sudden it completely lost its adhesive and fell off my dashboard. Now that I have purchased this one I will probably never go back to one that adheres to the dashboard. The fact it hooks onto your vent is much more of a guarantee that it will stay. So far so good! Plus the fact this pack comes with 2 magnets you can hook into your vent is a much better value.
customer_reviews.author: Seren Tsubahara

customer_reviews.title: It works fine
customer_reviews.text: So - I just bought the one piece / magnet. DID NOT buy the phone mount that is sold separately. Thus reading the limited directions with all these sticky things were useless. I put the rectangle magnet in my business card holder/sleeve. Works great. Got the magnet on my vent - and the phone attaches just fine. If you don't buy the phone mount - you may be better off just getting the phone mount that clips the phone in place. I like this because I can just pull it off the magnet when all done.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina L. Paradine

customer_reviews.title: then the vent joints are a bit more stiff and hold up better. Plus
customer_reviews.text: It all depends on the air vents. If it is an older car, then the weight of the phone may make the vent tilt downward.Because of that, I actually use both on one vent, to hold the phone upright, kinda frustrating. But if it is a newer car, then the vent joints are a bit more stiff and hold up better. Plus, it blocks the air. This should be obvious, but if it's cold, it blocks the hot air blowing on you, and the same in the summer. Kinda frustrating. But overall, it is nice and easy to use. Makes it convenient to use without holding it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product been using for years
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the car! I have been using mine for years now and it is wonderful and easy to use. It makes your phone easy to see for maps which I love. I have an older car that does not have navigation it in. This allows me to place my phone where I can see it and still have hands free driving. I have placed the magnet between my phone and the case so that I can transfer it as I change phone cases which works great. The phone rarely falls of The magnet. I would highly suggest for your car.

customer_reviews.title: Simple smart affordable and efficient.
customer_reviews.text: This phone mount is effective easy and inexpensive. You put the rubber mount on the vent and place the magnet in or behind your phone case (or use the adhesive magnetic sticker as my husband did). The two form a totally solid bond that places your phone at a highly visible angle in the car. You have to use two hands to take the Phone off the magnet or the rubber holder will come off (no big deal but...). It’s that strong. I highly recommend this product. Simple smart affordable and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: valsalwen

customer_reviews.title: Is a great product, but I found a little defect.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, and the fact that the cell phone is not blocking your sight from the windshield is what matters to me the most. However, I found a small defect. While it does adhere to the AC vents, sometimes when I pull the phone off the magnet, the magnet comes along with it. I find this a bit annoying. I also suggest a product improvement: Make the magnet tilt at different angles. Some cars have their vents tilted up about 10 degrees or so. When I put the phone, the sun reflection (glare) becomes a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Wilfrido

customer_reviews.title: Amazing strong product
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical at first about buying these as I use my phone a lot at my job while driving. I did not think they would hold but to my surprise they did and not only that, if positioned correctly it can be used with wireless charging. The unit itself sticks to the vent really well. The ONLY downside is you can’t adjust the unit towards you, it sets in a fixed position. Other than that though I would definitely recommend this product to someone who travels a lot in multiple vehicles. It’s small and compact and not in the way when not in use. Great sturdy product.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Magnets interfere with phone signal
customer_reviews.text: Great idea in theory. These hold the phone well, and the magnets are very strong. However, in order to get the phone to stick you must adhere one of the magnets to your phone or put it inside your phone case. I found that the magnets were scrambling my signal and creating lots of static when I was on the phone. Once I took the magnet out of my phone case the issue went away. So I can no longer use this product unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: CocoKikiCash

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have the right vents for this.
customer_reviews.text: This review is about 6 months in the making. Overall this works great but consider you air vent configuration first. In my car, it works great and holds the phone secure. I can put it up and down or side to side with no movement or any issues. In my Jeep, the vents spin so this isn’t the best option due to the weigh of the phone making the vents move and it’s hard to see the screen. Still holds tight though! The magnet that goes between the phone and case is slim enough to make it unnoticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lanham

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure if that's normal - I understand it needs to be powerful but having to do that every time is annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well but the magnet was so powerful that when I would remove it from the mount most of the time the mount would come off with the phone. Then I'd have to remove the mount from my phone and put in back in the vent. I'm not sure if that's normal - I understand it needs to be powerful but having to do that every time is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: rowndy

customer_reviews.title: Been through several of these, HATED each one...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this piece of crap for a while now, and I’m finally sick and tired of my phone constantly falling off. In the beginning, it works great and holds on strong like advertised. But eventually the magnet loses its power over time and your phone will slowly start to fall off more and more and more. Until you realize this is what you get for going the cheap route. I would highly advise to find something more reliable and effective in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Ibn Hamid

customer_reviews.title: When running your vehicle's heat - beware.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this. The other devices that I tried failed. This seemed promising. I attached to metal plate to my iPhone 7+'s Otter box case. Placed the magnet holder in the vent, which held very well. But after 20 minutes of having the heat running through the floor vents, not the body vents so some heat was flowing but not full force, the glue on the metal plate got so warm that it lost it's holding power and the phone dropped off. Maybe because I had the plate attached to the Otter box case and not directly to the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua LeBeau

customer_reviews.title: STRONG
customer_reviews.text: BROUGHT THIS 3 TIMES, REALLY GOOD PRODUCT I brought many deferent brands before I try this, first time I got this brand my dad likes it and took it then my brother in low i hope i can keep the last one :) every one in my family has it we all love how strong it is the funny thing and the most thing i like about it that i used mine for couple of months before my brother in low took it, I was able to hang my phone on all the cars we used without having the sticker on I believe the magnet stays on the phone
customer_reviews.author: marwa zraid

customer_reviews.title: Easily Clips to Air Vent and HOLDS WELL - Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Installation could not be any easier, just clip to any air vent. The magnet holds VERY well and you can easily change phone orientation by simply removing phone and replacing on mount at desired angle. My only concern is that the phone mounted on the air vent does block the flow of air from that vent a tiny bit, so if you need the AC or heat blasting directly on your face, this type of mount might not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: John Cortese

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, but replaced an old one
customer_reviews.text: I love how easily these work and that they come with multiple magnets for multiple devices. We had one that needed replacement because the grip got loose. We did, however, opt for this two-pack so that both of us could use one and not fight over the single one. I love this thing and it has changed my commute since I can EASILY look at my GPS and know exactly where it is every time. I just hope these don't lose their grip too quickly. VERY worth it for the price, though.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan D

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected, but not the best way to mount your phone.
customer_reviews.text: These worked as described but I found it too cumbersome to mount the phone in an air vent. It blocks air and made it impossible to angle the vent and control the direction of the air that actually made it around the phone. It also really limits where you can mount the phone...right or left vent are your only options. I went with an adhesive dashboard mount and definitely prefer that.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Song

customer_reviews.title: Sticker magnets eventually come off
customer_reviews.text: The magnets do stick to your phone or phone case for a while ... after 3 months the magnet came off my phone while I was driving sending it flying through the car. I had driven less than 500 miles. Second, unless you shove the main holder piece deep into your vent , both phone and holder will fall. Finally, if the magnet is in your phone or case it will not charge using the charger port. Overall, this was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Tennyson

customer_reviews.title: Newer is better.
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered a set of these a few months ago and really loved them. The rubber section that attached to the vent has two options for thickness and they hold great. I lost one of the vent mount magnets and decided to order another set. The new set seems to have more magnetism over the other mounts although they are the same from what I can tell and the price point is still great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Moto Dad

customer_reviews.title: Super simple and effective.
customer_reviews.text: I have used the version of this product that sticks to a surface for years now. After switching it to the new car, the sticky surface gave up. I saw this vent version and decided to try it. I literally mounts in a second. It has stayed mounted just fine for the week or so that I have been using it and works just like the old one. It does, however, heat and cool the phone since it's mounted to the vent. I will have to shut off a vent to or let it be heated and cooled. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: People keep stealing mine!!
customer_reviews.text: These are THE best little gadgets I've ordered related to my phone for a long time. There are many different versions out there but none are made as well as these are. I use them in my work car and when I've made the mistake of forgetting to take them home with me, they're instantly snagged by other people. This is my 3rd set and hopefully my last. Make sure you buy the magnets and your power cord is long enough to reach the charger if you're using it as a GPS device as I do. A++++
customer_reviews.author: Big Mama

customer_reviews.title: not for big phonesss
customer_reviews.text: It might be ok for small phones. I am using Samsung Note 4. first I applied it out of the case and enjojed it for 5 days. After 5 days the metal plate stayed on the magnet so the adhesive was not working. I put the metal plate inside of the cover this time the magnet is not strong enough to hold it and phone felt a couple of times. I was lucky that my phone did not broken, and I did not make any accident while trying to catch it.. I gave 2 stars because It might work with Iphone 5 - 6 or etc smaller phones but definatelly not got note 4 - 5 or Ihone 6+ etc.
customer_reviews.author: aslanli

customer_reviews.title: Strong Magnet Durable Product
customer_reviews.text: I'll definitely buy these again but may not have to because they seem very durable and high quality. This makes hands free driving SO easy, and so much better than those "clamp down" phone holders where it can be difficult to set and remove the phone. The magnet is super strong (I attached the metal sheet to the inside of my soft-shell phone case); I have had zero issues with the phone falling or even shifting whatsoever. Reviews on so many of these magnetic holders are quite mixed but I love this thing and can't believe I didn't get one years ago. This has made my long work commute so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: DRhymes

customer_reviews.title: Cannot use them with heat or air on.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these but I can't close my vents or turn off the blower in the one vent, so whenever I mount my phone on it, I cannot use my heat or air. THAT is a huge deal for me, and makes the product virtually unusable :( please, check to make sure you can block the vent before you decide on these. It's something I wish I had checked first. Maybe newer cars (mine is a 2006 Honda) have individual vent control, but mine doesn't. Really stinks.
customer_reviews.author: bluefollydoll

customer_reviews.title: Does what they need to do!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these at first, but now that I've had them for a few months, the magnet on my phone is so strong, that it pulls out the part stuck to the vent! I changed covers on my phone, and before I had the magnet on my actual phone inside a thinner cover and I think it was just the right amount of magnetization, but now that I have to put the magnet on the outside of my phone, it's too strong. So I don't know if it's the magnet or that the gripper on my vent is weaker...
customer_reviews.author: StormywormieTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Safety first for our teenage grandsons who are just now starting to drive.
customer_reviews.text: Our third and most recent purchase was for gifts for our 15 & 17 year old grandsons. We want to assure they have their phones “out of their pockets” and on the dashboard when they sit in that driver’s seat. Plus logging in to the phone’s map features assures they know exactly where they are going and it prominently lists the speed limit. No more wondering when the next speed limit sign will show up on the road - it is always in their view when comparing the car’s speed to the phone’s screen both while looking our the front window of the car. Safe and Secure - we think the WizGear is a safety-first gift.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Copper

customer_reviews.title: Strong Magnet & Works well...with a caveat
customer_reviews.text: As designed. I like the strength of the magnets and how easy it was to get it working. My only reason for not giving 5 stars was that my phone has wireless charging capabilities, and the magnet (which I placed inside my protective cover) interferes with the wireless charger. I had to use the smaller magnet and strategically place it in a spot that still allowed for wireless charging. A little bit of work to get the best of both worlds but I still prefer this magnet to other types of phone mounts.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product but I do not love it.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product but I don't love it. I really enjoy how easy it is to push into the ac vent however noticed after just a few uses that the metal prongs cut through rubber and is scratching my ac vent. Maybe because I move it from the middle vent to the side often as the phone gets hot in the sun but blocks my drink holder when I put it on the side vent. Also the metal plate gets hot in the sun and causes my phone to auto shutdown due to the heat temp warning..
customer_reviews.author: Lilo777

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet - not useful product.
customer_reviews.text: 1) The magnet itself is very strong. 2) it is not that convenient to put it on the air conditioning - it blocks the air and bas noise is blowing into the phone mic. 3) When you take your phone off, it usually takes the whole thing with it (since it is so strong magnet but weak connection to the air conditioning). 4) Next time I would go with a product you can stick.
customer_reviews.author: Hanan Rubin חנן רובין

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit all vents!
customer_reviews.text: This product looks and feels great. However, out of 3 of our cars it only works for 1. You have to try it on your car vents to see if it fits right. We have a car that whenever we turn or break this product falls off the vent! It works great for our Prius. Not great for our Toyota Tundra and Mazda Miata. Disappointed, I would have bought a different brand if I would have known that.
customer_reviews.author: Paras Barnett

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited about ordering this. It was a great price and now I know why. Saw many reviews on TikTok but..... the two piece magnet set just isn’t strong enough for my iPhone 11. I thought it was going great until the first sharp turn I made it fell off on the floor of my drivers seat. The rubber piece fits very well into the vent but the magnet needs to be much stronger. 😔
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these three times, for multiple phones I have, as well as replacement mounts for my & my girlfriend's vehicles. The magnetic pull is excellent, allowing me to toss my phone at the dash & still have it catch (when I'm accurate, anyway). The phone comes off easily enough, though you might need to pull at just the smallest angle otherwise the clip might just come off the vent with the phone. The magnet has never fallen off my phone or lost adhesion.
customer_reviews.author: Yale G.

product_meta.title: Magnetic Phone Car Mount, WizGear [2 PACK] Universal Air Vent Magnetic Phone Car Mount Phone Holder, for Cell Phones and Mini Tablets with Fast Swift-Snap Technology, With 4 Metal Plates
feature_bullets: 2 PACK AIR VENT MOUNTS: This Air vent universal smartphone magnetic phone car mount holder is 10 times easier to use than any other magnetic car mount holder due to its simple and complementary design. It has a sturdy rubber base and a powerful magnetic head for holding smartphones. Car Mount iPhone 6, Car mount iphone 6 plus, Car mount holder

STURDY WIZGEAR AIR VENT: This high quality rubber construction of the base of the mount is unique and very functional as well. It guarantees that the base of the mount will solidly hold the magnetic head of the mount, to help keep your smartphone in place, regardless of road vibrations or impacts.

SWIVELS YOUR DISPLAY: Rotate your smartphone and swivel your display as you please. The base of the mount remains fixed into the air vent of your car and does not move, no matter how much swiveling or rotation you do. This guarantees that your smartphone will always remain in your preferred position.

WIZGEAR COMPLEMENTARY DESIGN: The complementary WizGear design of the magnetic mount is one that fits in to the back of any smartphone. The magnetic mount is has a smooth surface that is perfectly suitable for mounting and holding any smartphone in place.

POWERFUL WIZGEAR MAGNETIC PHONE MOUNT: The reinforced magnetic phone car holder of this mount is what sets it apart from other mounts. This Universal magnetic holder produces an intensive force of attraction that will hold any smartphone. phone holder for car, car phone mount, cell phone holder for car, phone holder, car phone holder, phone car mount.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars24,179 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
